response: twitter is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that you have control over how your information is used. we do not sell or share any personal information with third parties for their marketing purposes without your explicit consent. additionally, we provide tools to help you manage the information you choose to share on twitter, such as customizing your profile and controlling who can see your tweets. it's important to us that you feel comfortable using twitter, so if you have any questions or concerns about privacy, please visit our privacy policy for more information.<|endoftext|>
